law.text:
A person is guilty of distribution of obscene matter when, having knowledge of its content and character, he:
Sends or causes to be sent into this state for sale or distribution; or
Brings or causes to be brought into this state for sale or distribution; or
In this state, he:
Prepares, or
Publishes, or
Prints, or
Exhibits, or
Distributes, or
Offers to distribute, or
Has in his possession with intent to distribute, exhibit or offer to distribute, any obscene matter.
Distribution of obscene matter is a Class B misdemeanor unless the defendant has in his possession more than one unit of material coming within the provisions of this chapter, in which case it shall be a Class A misdemeanor.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 266, effective January 1, 1975.
